A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a die-hard fan of the original and prequel trilogy of Star Wars\, I'm highly disappointed with Episode VIII... Jarring\, overly sarcastic\, post-modernist humor throughout.. Incredibly \"preachy\" and steeped in SJW narrative that completely takes you out of the experience. What makes it such a shame too is that this movie had so much potential. Not to mention the utter slap in the face to source materiel and established characters. As a character\, Luke is tossed aside and treated as dog doo.
